Aura: Demon's Knot.name: Aura: Demon's Knot
Aura: Demon's Knot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.2TANKQXO6xntX5MT]{Demon's Knot}

You take a –1 status penalty to Will saves.

Aura: Elysian Dew.name: Aura: Elysian Dew
Aura: Elysian Dew.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8vN6vm2fKB4rE86U]{Elysian Dew}

You gain a 10-foot aura. You and any ally that starts its turn in the emanation gain 5 temporary Hit Points, a +1 item bonus to saving throws, and a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics and Athletics checks until the start of your or the ally's next turn.

Aura: Fuming Cloak.name: Aura: Fuming Cloak
Aura: Fuming Cloak.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ASjNBiQfQfWppPJc]{Nightmare's Lament}

The nightmare's lament continually vents thick, black smoke that creates concealment in a 15-foot aura around the gun's wielder.

Aura: Searing Blade (Greater).name: Aura: Searing Blade (Greater)
Aura: Searing Blade (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.pvxRcuBexbFawjCg]{Searing Blade (Greater)}

A @Template[emanation|distance:10] of flame radiates from the greater searing blade for 1 minute. All weapon and unarmed attacks by you and your allies within the area gain the effect of the flaming property rune.

Aura: Shining Symbol.name: Aura: Shining Symbol
Aura: Shining Symbol.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.YVtXlsEWb3NIkDyy]{Shining Symbol}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.M7c4uXraP05HYNXs]{Shining Symbol (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.etnis6HOeGZEbScD]{Shining Symbol (Major)}

The light cast by the symbol becomes bright light. Creatures in the light receive a status penalty to Deception and Stealth checks and your enemies gain weakness to spirit damage.

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Greater).name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Greater)
Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Qm0ZiyXail7Lv0dq]{Ablative Armor Plating (Greater)}

The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 20 Hit Points for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Lesser).name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Lesser)
Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Lesser).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.U9XNSFQzCOo6KMD1]{Ablative Armor Plating (Lesser)}

The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 5 Hit Points for 1 minute or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Major).name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Major)
Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.xXvuQABxlRH2HXsO]{Ablative Armor Plating (Major)}

The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 30 Hit Points for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Moderate.name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Moderate)
Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Moderate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.P7Evi8Wv8zIwLYtU]{Ablative Armor Plating (Moderate)}

The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 10 Hit Points for 10 minutes or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (True).name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (True)
Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (True).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.RdsQliP7Gi1xe8xH]{Ablative Armor Plating (True)}

The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 40 Hit Points for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Aeon Stone (Black Pearl).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.J7vQowV531Sz73Gw]{Aeon Stone (Black Pearl)}

Effect: Aeon Stone (Sprouting).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.BYr1DRYmiRsyr4po]{Aeon Stone (Sprouting)}

Effect: Aeon Stone Resonance (Amplifying.name: Effect: Aeon Stone Resonance (Amplifying)
Effect: Aeon Stone Resonance (Amplifying.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.MO8J2IcBhiTnm9D8]{Aeon Stone (Amplifying)}

The resonant power grants you a +2 item bonus to Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion checks-whichever corresponds to the tradition of the last spell you enhanced with this aeon stone.

Effect: Aeon Stone Resonance (Black Disc.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ffQwBOmyy2NyatnC]{Aeon Stone (Black Disc)}

The resonant power grants you resistance 10 to holy and to vitality damage.

Effect: Aeon Stone Resonance (Pearly Whi.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.4A8SFipG78SMWQEU]{Aeon Stone (Pearly White Spindle)}

Effect: Alloy Orb (Exquisite High-Grade).name: Effect: Alloy Orb (Exquisite High-Grade)
Effect: Alloy Orb (Exquisite High-Grade).description:

When you activate the alloy orb, select adamantine, cold iron, or dawnsilver. The affixed weapon functions as the chosen material.

Effect: Alloy Orb (Exquisite Standard-Gr.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.tTrJnXJYt15arH6G]{Alloy Orb (Exquisite Standard-Grade)}

When you activate the alloy orb, select adamantine, cold iron, or dawnsilver. The affixed weapon functions as the chosen material.

Effect: Alloy Orb (High-Grade).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.s0DffbZbYlav3mu1]{Alloy Orb (High-Grade)}

When you activate the alloy orb, select cold iron or silver. The affixed weapon functions as the chosen material.

Effect: Amphisbaena Spittle.name: Effect: Amphisbaena Spittle
Effect: Amphisbaena Spittle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Hoe17WNDQ2PQd9JZ]{Amphisbaena Spittle}

The target cannot be flanked until the start of its next turn.

Effect: Ancestral Geometry.name: Effect: Ancestral Geometry
Effect: Ancestral Geometry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.PSKFnWMq5daOJa1R]{Ancestral Geometry}

Roll 2d20 and record the highest result. Then roll 1d6 and note a type of saving throw: 1–2 Fortitude, 3–4 Reflex, and 5–6 Will.

Effect: Animal Blind.name: Effect: Animal Blind
Effect: Animal Blind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.40T4HrQdIIwGHMDq]{Animal Blind}

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks to Hide.

You gain an item bonus to Fortitude saves against poisons.

Effect: Antifungal Salve.name: Effect: Antifungal Salve
Effect: Antifungal Salve.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TEd1rxn3CfPeh0jZ]{Antifungal Salve (Lesser)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.QPaArkVoNOBv5YRU]{Antifungal Salve (Moderate)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8v5fKBgw7jsCBu8U]{Antifungal Salve (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.rS3DCw5B0fEVICVW]{Antifungal Salve (Major)}

You gain an item bonus to saves against fungal afflictions.

Effect: Antiplague.name: Effect: Antiplague
Effect: Antiplague.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.UqinuuCWePTYGhVO]{Antiplague (Lesser)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.biRbqKo2C97XLfQ0]{Antiplague (Moderate)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ORDaAzMZLrf6Hn8A]{Antiplague (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.kajpTXg3oHIJStQa]{Antiplague (Major)}

You gain an item bonus to Fortitude saves against diseases.

Effect: Applereed Mutagen (Greater).name: Effect: Applereed Mutagen (Greater)
Effect: Applereed Mutagen (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.vTEWlRBUD4VzVwxK]{Applereed Mutagen (Greater)}

Benefit You gain a +4 item bonus to Athletics checks and you gain a +20 foot status bonus to your Speed. In addition, you grow one size larger, but your larger size does not have any additional effects beyond the potential change in space.

Drawback You take a -1 penalty to AC and a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Effect: Applereed Mutagen (Lesser).name: Effect: Applereed Mutagen (Lesser)
Effect: Applereed Mutagen (Lesser).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.0RTsyWutvO42O0zK]{Applereed Mutagen (Lesser)}

Benefit You gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks and you gain a +10 foot status bonus to your Speed. In addition, you grow one size larger, but your larger size does not have any additional effects beyond the potential change in space.

Drawback You take a -1 penalty to AC and a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Effect: Applereed Mutagen (Moderate).name: Effect: Applereed Mutagen (Moderate)
Effect: Applereed Mutagen (Moderate).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8e37h6HBr4ZyBSGt]{Applereed Mutagen (Moderate)}

Benefit You gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks and you gain a +15 foot status bonus to your Speed. In addition, you grow one size larger, but your larger size does not have any additional effects beyond the potential change in space.

Drawback You take a -1 penalty to AC and a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Effect: Apricot of Bestial Might.name: Effect: Apricot of Bestial Might
Effect: Apricot of Bestial Might.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.O4SbscW0mhRRSbRK]{Apricot of Bestial Might}

You gain 8 resistance to all physical damage and gain a tusk unarmed attack with the deadly d12 trait that deals 1d10 piercing damage. You become clumsy 1.

Effect: Arachnid Harness.name: Effect: Arachnid Harness
Effect: Arachnid Harness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JG7p7yI12cAPuJ8X]{Arachnid Harness} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NIyJqiW1Wci6gP9m]{Arachnid Harness (Greater)}

You gain a climb Speed equal to half your land Speed and have your limbs free as you climb. If you use all your free limbs to help you Climb, your climb Speed equals your land Speed.

Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalt.name: Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalty)
Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalt.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.4kyf3ScoJ4TvhPG3]{Arboreal's Revenge}

The targets take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds as roots rapidly sprout from their wounds, which lasts until they [[/act escape dc=20]]

Effect: Architect's Pattern Book.name: Effect: Architect's Pattern Book
Effect: Architect's Pattern Book.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Kx1Se9u0LU1ZS5R1]{Architect's Pattern Book}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks and Will saves.

Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.name: Effect: Aromatic Ammunition
Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.iYsDDvFduPhtaIOr]{Aromatic Ammunition}

Any creatures within 30 feet smell the target, allowing even those with a weak sense of smell to detect its presence, and all creatures gain a +1 item bonus to Track the affected creature for as long as it has the odor. A creature that has imprecise or precise scent doubles the range at which they can detect the target using their scent compared to the normal range of their scent.

Effect: Ascendant Dragon Spirit.name: Effect: Ascendant Dragon Spirit
Effect: Ascendant Dragon Spirit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.7fN8xgFBxqrOkCJW]{Ascendant Dragon Spirit}

Your unarmed Strikes deal an additional 1d6 poison damage and an additional 1d6 void damage.

Effect: Assassin Vine Wine.name: Effect: Assassin Vine Wine
Effect: Assassin Vine Wine.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.aSvDtG5i5l7scgru]{Assassin Vine Wine} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.tZiCnERZB6ww4eBu]{Aged Assassin Vine Wine}

You gain tremorsense at a range of 30 feet

Effect: Auric Noodles.name: Effect: Auric Noodles
Effect: Auric Noodles.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qQ9Rros3GdPDRLBg]{Auric Noodles}

You gain a +1 item bonus to checks to Identify Magic.

Effect: Azarim.name: Effect: Azarim
Effect: Azarim.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.KoyxJDibsKJh24am]{Azarim}

Azarim gains the effects of an anarchic weapon rune for 1 minute. When wielded by a character who's at least 11th level, Azarim becomes a +2 striking anarchic shifting rapier, and instead this activation can be applied to another weapon that's in physical contact with Azarim.

Effect: Barding of the Zephyr.name: Effect: Barding of the Zephyr
Effect: Barding of the Zephyr.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.eoI3M6FXtcPWeg7i]{Barding of the Zephyr}

You trace a finger along the wind motifs on the barding, granting your companion wearing the barding a fly Speed of 30 feet for 10 minutes. Even if the companion doesn't have the mount special ability, it can still Fly while being ridden.

Effect: Batsbreath Cane.name: Effect: Batsbreath Cane
Effect: Batsbreath Cane.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zB0Q86QD0A10CeFH]{Batsbreath Cane}

As long as you remain in the area and are holding the cane, you gain hearing as a precise sense.

Effect: Beastmaster's Sigil - Armor.name: Effect: Beastmaster's Sigil - Armor
Effect: Beastmaster's Sigil - Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JWFR4O5V06UUvx6W]{Beastmaster's Sigil}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.fWgH0JxNCOpI7SVr]{Beastmaster's Sigil (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ZxOoQ4cHfJXXbP9F]{Beastmaster's Sigil (Major)}

You gain an item bonus to saving throws against poison.

Effect: Beastmaster's Sigil - Melee Weap.name: Effect: Beastmaster's Sigil - Melee Weapon
Effect: Beastmaster's Sigil - Melee Weap.description:

You gain an item bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}.

Effect: Beastmaster's Sigil - Ranged Wea.name: Effect: Beastmaster's Sigil - Ranged Weapon
Effect: Beastmaster's Sigil - Ranged Wea.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JWFR4O5V06UUvx6W]{Beastmaster's Sigil}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.fWgH0JxNCOpI7SVr]{Beastmaster's Sigil (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ZxOoQ4cHfJXXbP9F]{Beastmaster's Sigil (Major)}

If you critically hit with the affixed weapon, and the target is adjacent to a creature summoned with the sigil, the target takes 1d6 persistent bleed damage (or 2d6 persistent bleed damage with a major sigil).

Effect: Belt of the Five Kings (Allies).name: Effect: Belt of the Five Kings (Allies)
Effect: Belt of the Five Kings (Allies).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.YCjVrQnHfOtpmjYW]{Belt of the Five Kings}

Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Greater).name: Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Greater)

You take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves, Acrobatics checks, and Stealth checks.

Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Lesser).name: Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Lesser)
Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Lesser).description:

You gain a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks and unarmed attack rolls. You gain a claw unarmed attack (1d4 slashing damage) with the agile trait and a jaws unarmed attack (1d6 piercing damage).

You take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves, Acrobatics checks, and Stealth checks.

Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Major).name: Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Major)
Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.nS75vsM3x5jxlUqn]{Bestial Mutagen (Major)}

You gain a +4 item bonus to Athletics checks and unarmed attack rolls. You gain a claw unarmed attack (4d8 slashing damage) with the agile trait and a jaws unarmed attack (4d10 piercing damage).

You take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves, Acrobatics checks, and Stealth checks.

Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Moderate).name: Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Moderate)
Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Moderate).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.VISk5uLPVIvNWovB]{Bestial Mutagen (Moderate)}

You take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves, Acrobatics checks, and Stealth checks.

You gain a +2 status bonus to Will saves against mental effects. This bonus increases to +3 against emotion effects.

Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Magnolia).name: Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Magnolia)
Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Magnolia).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.LDtIZ822rqBD88U2]{Bewitching Bloom (Magnolia)}

You become immobilized, gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex save against area effects, and gain resistance 5 to all damage you would normally take from area effects and scatter splash damage.

Effect: Blaze.name: Effect: Blaze
Effect: Blaze.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.q5Hr2nZr8RQ9DSZM]{Blaze}

Effect: Blight Breath.name: Effect: Blight Breath
Effect: Blight Breath.description:

You gain resistance 10 to poison.

Effect: Blood Booster.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8g2U2PMC0lkPZEvq]{Blood Booster (Lesser)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.LNzJ2WwTg58g7vam]{Blood Booster (Moderate)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.3UXsXwUbvOdpPg6b]{Blood Booster (Greater)}

Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Greater).name: Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Greater)
Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Greater).description:

You gain an imprecise scent with a 60 foot range and a +3 item bonus to your Survival check to Track a creature by its scent.

Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Lesser).name: Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Lesser)
Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Lesser).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.mDJSaarQsIMX7Opi]{Bloodhound Mask (Lesser)}

You gain an imprecise scent with a 15 foot range and a +1 item bonus to your Survival check to Track a creature by its scent.

Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Moderate).name: Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Moderate)
Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Moderate).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qasFfdiZKIczoZ9p]{Bloodhound Mask (Moderate)}

You gain an imprecise scent with a 30 foot range and a +2 item bonus to your Survival check to Track a creature by its scent.

Effect: Bloodhound Olfactory Stimulators.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.P1hk0BO89ihEAw8g]{Bloodhound Olfactory Stimulators}

You gain imprecise scent with a range of 30 feet.

Effect: Bloodseeker Beak.name: Effect: Bloodseeker Beak
Effect: Bloodseeker Beak.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.k6D64EAjcKMf8NZB]{Bloodseeker Beak}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.oTRUHPASPD4USU4o]{Bloodseeker Beak (Greater)}

Effect: Deck of Destiny.name: Effect: Deck of Destiny
Effect: Deck of Destiny.description: Choose either weal or woe. With weal (a fortune effect), the triggering creature rolls twice and takes the better result on their check. With woe (a misfortune effect), the triggering creature is forced to roll twice and take the worse result. If the card you drew is related to the check, such as drawing a card from the suit of shields for a Fortitude saving throw or a card from the suit of crowns for a Deception check, the creature is affected further. When choosing weal, the creature gains a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering check. When faced with woe, the triggering creature takes a –4 circumstance penalty to the triggering check

Activate 2 envision (force)

Requirements The energizing lattice is glowing because it negated an enemy's critical hit

Effect You release the lattice's energy and make a weapon or unarmed attack Strike that deals 6d6 additional force damage. If your Strike fails, but doesn't critically fail, the target still takes half the force damage. The latticework ceases glowing after the Strike.

  • Skeptical +3 item bonus to saves against magic
  • Titanic size change to Large, Clumsy 1, and change of reach (+5 for Medium and Small, +10 for Tiny)
  • Wyrmhide resistance 10 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and poison.

Drawback You take a –1 penalty to AC and a –2 penalty to Reflex saves.

  • Titanic size change to Large, Clumsy 1, and change of reach (+5 for Medium and Small, +10 for Tiny)

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.bOPQDM54W8ZDoULY]{Serene Mutagen (Lesser)}

Benefit You gain a +1 bonus to Will saves and Perception, Medicine, Nature, Religion, and Survival checks. This bonus improves to +2 when you attempt Will saves against mental effects.

Drawback You take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a -1 penalty per damage die to all weapon and unarmed attack damage.

Effect: Serene Mutagen (Major).name: Effect: Serene Mutagen (Major)
Effect: Serene Mutagen (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ccrdVliTNBh2mNZf]{Serene Mutagen (Major)}

Benefit You gain a +4 bonus to Will saves and Perception, Medicine, Nature, Religion, and Survival checks. When you roll a success on a Will save against a mental effect, you get a critical success instead, and your critical failures on Will saves against mental effects become failures instead.

Drawback You take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a -1 penalty per damage die to all weapon and unarmed attack damage.

Effect: Serene Mutagen (Moderate).name: Effect: Serene Mutagen (Moderate)

You take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and save DCs of offensive spells, and a -1 penalty per damage die to all weapon and unarmed attack damage.
